vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Also named: a.phar.sat.te.khay (אֲפָֽרְסַתְּכָיֵא "govenors" H0671B)
§ Apharsachites = "as causers of division (?)" Apharsathchites = "I will divide the deceivers (?)"
1) (CLBL) an unknown office
2) (BDB) perhaps an office or an official
3) (TWOT)
3a) a people
3b) perhaps a title of an official
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞法薩迦人 或 亞薩提迦人
1) 波斯人, 也可能是一種官銜#拉 4:9; 5:6; 6:6)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚法萨迦人 或 亚萨提迦人
1) 波斯人, 也可能是一种官衔#拉 4:9; 5:6; 6:6)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Aramaic of a.phar.se.khay (אֲפָֽרְסְכָיֵא "governors" H0671A)
§ Apharsachites = "as causers of division (?)" Apharsathchites = "I will divide the deceivers (?)"
1) (CLBL) an unknown office
2) (BDB) perhaps an office or an official
3) (TWOT)
3a) a people
3b) perhaps a title of an official
